'''Inazuma''' is a Card Box in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Description==
{{Description|Lightning flashes, then passes, illuminating the solitude of thunder.<br />Dreams of madness come and go &mdash; all things are impermanent.|Deck Design Settings Menu}}

==Battle Themes==
Battle Themes during matches are dependent on the Card Box being used. When using '''Inazuma''' the following themes are played:
* [[Against the Invisible Net]]
* [[Overlord of the Thunderstorm]]
